tool_description: With this API, you can easily access a wide range of words and phrases organized by topic, making it perfect for language learners, translators, and developers building multilingual word games or applications.
name: Multi-Lingual Word List
title: Multi-Lingual Word List

api_list.name: Word List
api_list.description: Provide a category, a language and optionally a maximum list length. The API will return a list of thematic words in the chosen language.

required_parameters.name: language

api_list.name: Languages
api_list.description: Returns a list of supported languages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://multi-lingual-word-list.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "multi-lingual-word-list.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://multi-lingual-word-list.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "multi-lingual-word-list.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
